A new Curse!(Must be enabled manually) 9 New Characters(Wakaba, Shiori, Tsukasa, Rich√©r, with both tainted forms, and Rira) 80+ new Items 15+ new Trinkets 15+ new Card/Runes 10+ new Pills 19 new Challenges
[h1]Items[/h1] [b][url=https://kohashiwakaba.notion.site/4e87f1c646524283896401a270750755?v=b0de151aac874afa8aec361b255110f9]Item Guides are finally here[/url], but Using External Item Description, or Encyclopedia Wiki is strongly recommended!. [/b] old mini item guide is in discussion.
[b][strike][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2543118811/5183064363533361286]Character Informations under construction[/url][/strike], Using Encyclopedia Wiki is strongly recommended. [/b]
[h1] Stackable Holy Mantle [/h1] Have multiple shields at the same time! Collecting multiple Holy Mantle items now allows to give corresponding amount of shields. This mod also gives multiple shields for Blanket item if you entered a Boss Room, Plus now works on Dogma and The Beast fight! [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2613009134]Stackable Holy Mantle is also available as a seperate mod.[/url]
[h1] Curse of Flames (Experimental) [/h1] - Isaac cannot touch items! the items are cursed and it will be on fire! - Trying to get items will turn item to Wisps. - Wisps spawned this way are much stronger than regular wisps. - Plot-Critical items like Polaroid/Negative can be collected as normal even when curse is active.
[h1] Inventory Descriptions (Experimental) [/h1] - Press F5 to show current items you have. Pressing F5 again to exit list mode. - Also shows current curse descriptions.
[h1] More Notes [/h1] [list] [*] [b]Using with REPENTOGON is highly recommended.[/b] [*] [b]Like other mods, you MUST restart the game if you installed, enabled/disabled, or updated the mod.[/b] [*] Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362] Encyclopedia [/url] [*] Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787] Mod Config Menu - Pure [/url] (Mod Config Menu - Continued no longer works.) [*] Wakaba's Mega Mush costume requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2697721144]Unique MEGAIsaacs[/url] [/list]
True co-op not tested, but most items should work. except for certain items which requires rendering text [spoiler]Wakaba's Double Dreams[/spoiler]
[h1] Special Thanks [/h1] - _Kilburn - Tearsup function - AgentCucco - Various code snippets, Achievement Papers, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2520695034]Damocles API[/url] - Mana - Item reroll function - meloonicscorp - Glitched item spawn function - Xalum (Retribution) - Major mechanics for custom rooms(for implementation for Tainted Richer planetariums), base format for custom callbacks - DeadInfinity - getting current dimension snippet - Zamiel, (+ NeoDement) - Isaacscript (+ for player identifier logic) - im_tem - Pseudo-Lilith Birtrhright position - Wofsauge - Pseudo-Dark Arts trails snippet - Cadaver: The Rotten Expansion - for implementation for Clover Chest - Connor - Hidden Item manager - bogdanrudyka - PostGetCollectible custom callback - NFrost - charge bar library - Sanio - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2541362255]Character Costume Protector[/url] library / PnW uses modified version of Costume Protector. - YouDuckBoom - Chinese EID translation
